text:
The car workshop at caltex isn't honest. I went in with a punctured tyre. The Indian worker told me they charge $15 for repairing and I agreed. But after pulling out the nail, it was realised that it couldn't be repaired due to the placement. Then came a Chinese man in his late 40(slighty bald and slightly short) telling me he need to check the price of the tyre if I want a replacement. And I agreed. After afew minutes, he informed me that I need to get 2 tyres and they don't sell in one. Which I told him to go ahead for the repair so that I can get to my regular workshop which was nearby. After repairing the hole, he wanting to charge me $30 instead of $15. I questioned him why am I being charged with the price of 2 tyre repair prices. He took a sticker type thingy and show me  which i don't even know what the heck is that. Explaining he use 2 strips of  that, and need to charge me for 2 tyres repair. I told him I will paid for $30 but I will review in Google all the details. And he changed his mind about charging me $30. That was when he changed his mind and said i could paid $15. I insisted I'll pay $30. Which he insisted $15 in the end.
P/s: Boss of that workshop, I stayed nearby. I'll glad to explain the whole situation, if you wanna know how your workers carrot customers. I emphasised, the Indian worker wasn't aware of the whole situation.

First time there to wash my car and pump petrol . The pump station lady was friendly, but the counter uncle kana Sai . Total donâ€™t know what is provide service . Caltex , please train your staff before put it on front line . Especially the uncle at the counter.

author_name: Roy Lin - GenTM Affordable Tailor Suits
text: Ravi , the pump attendant often give me superb service ! I like his smile and prompt service ! Keep up the good job!

I frequent here, morning staff took like 30mins to clear the counter (shift change).... today is worst. mention system down.... Management pls look into it. Many car come in and go. for the rest please avoid coming in from 0530 to 7am daily.

I have shared my feedback on caltex website & was advice they will reply three business day. I have sent on Monday and is been three days. Seems like they are ignoring my concerns. I have send another email to advice them to contact me by today, still no reply or concern.

I have sent my car for a wash on Monday which I have bought a package with their partners on February. The package includes dashboard & leather shine. I have spoken with the staff who is attending to my car. They have mention is was polished. I shall let the picture do the talking.

I do polish my leathers and dashboard just that since I have purchase the package why not use it.
